desc: Optical solutions for Eye Care Professionals. One of the largest manufacturers and suppliers of optical products in Western Canada. Precision and quality full service lab trusted for over 15 years. Based in Calgary, AB.

layout.text: Grow your optical business with Doctors Optical Lab Inc. We offer a complete solution for Eye Care Professionals providing high-quality optical products and eyewear services. Register today for contract pricing rates and access to online orders.
